CCG Markdown Publishing

  1. Open CCG folder
  2. Open each file in a text editor or a markdown editor (http://markable.in/editor/)
  3. Use cheatsheet as reference to format the content

Use this file as a model (published page) for the following PDFs:

  • Brazil

  • China

  • Argentina

  • Panama

Markdown Cheatsheet

Headings

H1

#H1

H2

##H2

H3

###H3

H4

####H4

Bold

**bold**

Links

Google

[Google](www.google.com)

Images

![Country](images/uscs.png)

Line break

---

Lists
